# Copilot Global Instructions

This project follows enterprise-level architecture standards.

## General Rules

- Always prioritize clean architecture.
- Follow SOLID principles.
- Never create business logic inside controllers.
- Always suggest unit tests when creating new features.
- Prefer explicit typing (TypeScript strict mode).
- Avoid code duplication.
- Follow folder structure conventions strictly.
- Use async/await instead of raw promises.
- Always validate input data.
- Always handle errors explicitly.

## Code Style

- Use descriptive variable names.
- Avoid single-letter variables.
- Prefer functional components (frontend).
- Keep functions small and focused.
- Add comments only when necessary.
